timeline.bodyText:
We say identifier multiple places, so I'd rather not introduce the shortened version for the new sentence. Let's change the wording a bit and remove the regex
The identifier must start with an alphanumeric character and
only contain alphanumeric, ``-``, or ``_`` characters.
timeline.author: electrum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,7 +51,9 @@ The above properties are described below:
   unique for every node. This identifier should remain consistent across
   reboots or upgrades of Presto. If running multiple installations of
   Presto on a single machine (i.e. multiple nodes on the same machine),
-  each installation must have a unique identifier.
+  each installation must have a unique identifier. The ID value can only use

timeline.message: Doc node.id and environment value restriction
Doc node.id and environment value restriction
